commands.name: az repos pr policy list
commands.summary: List policies of a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr policy list --id
                        [--detect {false, true}]
                        [--org]
                        [--skip]
                        [--top]

commands.name: az repos pr policy queue
commands.summary: Queue an evaluation of a policy for a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr policy queue --evaluation-id
                         --id
                         [--detect {false, true}]
                         [--org]
